title: Drawing, Design for Decorated Writing Table "A" in Satinwood, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Decorated Writing Table "A" in Satinwood
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, center top: For Mr. Jackson / in stock N.Y. Store; lower right, across bottom: statinwood decorated / $150.00 / A; center right of image, numerical notations.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong top with serpentine front having single central drawer flanked by 2 small drawers on either side; raised on 4 straight legs terminating in hoof feet; at back of top, center, a small arch-shaped cabinet with drawer top center; low backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Decorated Writing Table "A" in Satinwood, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-238
